$description: Core line height primitives as unitless multipliers. WCAG requires line-height of at least 1.5 for body text.

tight.$description: Tight line height (1.2 / 120%). Use for: large display headings.

snug.$description: Snug line height (1.35 / 135%). Use for: smaller headings.

normal.$description: Normal line height (1.5 / 150%). WCAG MINIMUM for body text.

relaxed.$description: Relaxed line height (1.65 / 165%). Use for: longer paragraphs.

loose.$description: Loose line height (1.8 / 180%). Use for: long-form prose.
